task.name: importnro
task.shortdescription: Convert NOSTAR data into a CASA visibility file (MS)

param.name: outputvis
param.description: Root name of the ms to be created. Note the .ms is NOT added

task.example:
Keyword arguments: asdm -- Name of input NOSTAR data default: none; example: asdm='mydata.Y'
outputvis -- Root ms name. Note that a prefix (.ms) is NOT appended to this name. default: none; example outputvis='myms.ms'
overwrite -- overwrite an existing MS default: False (do not overwrite)
parallel -- Turn on parallel execution default: False (serial execution)
